channel.title: Could anyone help me ? please
channel.description:
well look at sunday it always saying it offline mine server people saying is server down i say no and shitzz could anyone help me ?
its always at Sunday (no VPS) anyone help me ?

item.title: Could anyone help me ? please
item.dc:creator: @imstrength imstrength
item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

Dyl4n20:

He is saying that his server runs all the time except for on Sundays and he doesn’t know how to fix it.

haha that^^

i understood right away. and this makes no sense to me. try making sure you ip is static…you can use a program on portforward.com to make your ip static…this will also fix the other people who have netgear routers that change the ip all the damn time… hope i helped

Read full topic

item.title: Could anyone help me ? please
item.dc:creator: @Dyl4n20 Dyl4n20
item.description:
@Dyl4n20 wrote:

He is saying that his server runs all the time except for on Sundays and he doesn’t know how to fix it.

item.title: Could anyone help me ? please
item.dc:creator: @jkicool jkicool
item.description:
@jkicool wrote:

[quote=“heatrn11, post:5, topic:465402”][quote author=fuckjagex link=topic=570582.msg4133676#msg4133676 date=1351449419]

well look at sunday it always saying it offline mine server people saying is server down i say no and shitzz could anyone help me ?

its always at Sunday (no VPS) anyone help me ?

what you mean? your server isn’t up? well this might be the problem. if you have netgear , go to where you portfoward and go to cmd and type ipconfig. check if you port foward is correct because i had one befor then the next day, some how the numbers changed.

well ive checked all but it always take down when its sunday :l
[/quote]
Do you speak English?[/quote]
I wonder how people like you can be so rude…
[on topic]
Would be talking about server status on advertisement or are you talking about it not running on the computer your hosting it on?

Read full topic

item.title: Could anyone help me ? please
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

I can understand you to the point to where I get the gist of what you’re trying to say. Are you referring to the Server Status Advertisement page?

Read full topic

item.title: Could anyone help me ? please
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“fuckjagex, post:7, topic:465402”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=570582.msg4133692#msg4133692 date=1351450732]

well look at sunday it always saying it offline mine server people saying is server down i say no and shitzz could anyone help me ?

its always at Sunday (no VPS) anyone help me ?

what you mean? your server isn’t up? well this might be the problem. if you have netgear , go to where you portfoward and go to cmd and type ipconfig. check if you port foward is correct because i had one befor then the next day, some how the numbers changed.

well ive checked all but it always take down when its sunday :l

Do you speak English?

Even if his/her native language isn’t English, they got down the most important phrase: “Fuck Jagex”.
[/quote]

i you want to help me help me then idc im from belguim idc im not that good at english …[/quote]
If you want people to help you, they have to understand you first.

Sorry, maybe try rephrasing what you said…

Read full topic

item.title: Could anyone help me ? please

well ive checked all but it always take down when its sunday :l

Do you speak English?
[/quote]

i you want to help me help me then idc im from belguim idc im not that good at english …
